xmlText.p: First Period_1, Minnesota, Parise 2 (Staal, Winnik), 0:45. Penalties_Ottawa bench, served by Ryan (too many men on the ice), 17:50.
Second Period_2, Ottawa, Duchene 11 (DiDomenico), 9:38. Penalties_Suter, MIN, (boarding), 11:41.
Third Period_3, Minnesota, Zucker 19 (Koivu, Granlund), 4:59. 4, Minnesota, Granlund 14 (Suter, Dumba), 10:09 (pp). Penalties_Foligno, MIN, (tripping), 6:26; Claesson, OTT, (interference), 9:00.
